R

readFromSocketPlayerLobbyAndName() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.networkLayer.ServerSocket
Asks the client for lobby number, player name and number of players, if it catches an IOException or a ClassNotFound exception it will consider the client dead, it will close the socket and delete the player by updating the object's observers with a AnswerKillPlayer object

Recreates the list of the lobbies, basic refresh function.
